snippet.title: G-Nome: The Forgotten 90s Mech Game
snippet.description:
Grand Theft HAWC? Pretty much! This is a retrospective on the 1997 mech simulation game from 7th Level. Wander alien landscapes, boost mechs, and enjoy the chunky software-rendered 3D graphics.

● Consider supporting LGR on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/LazyGameReviews

● Social links:
https://twitter.com/lazygamereviews
https://www.facebook.com/LazyGameReviews

● Music used in order of appearance:
Got That Feeling 3, Relaxation Station
http://www.epidemicsound.com
